items.sentence: Tom speaks not only French, but also English.
We didn\'t know the whole story at that time.
We don\'t have very much time to finish this.
You should tell Tom that Mary won\'t do that.
Why didn\'t anyone tell me anything about it?
I can assure you that\'s not going to happen.
How much does a gallon of gas cost in Boston?
How much longer is Tom going to be in Boston?
How much of what Tom said did you understand?
I really didn\'t want to play in Tom\'s band.
I only wish to talk to Tom for a few minutes.
I opened the window to let in some fresh air.
I plan to hire someone who can speak English.
I plan to stay in Boston for three more days.
You must\'ve been surprised to see Tom there.
I saw Tom working on the report this morning.
I\'d like to show this picture of Tom to you.
I didn\'t know Tom was going to come with us.
I didn\'t know how to speak French very well.
I didn\'t know that Tom was a police officer.
